DOC.brief_summary: The objective study provide ongoing evaluation clinical outcome associate GORE Flow Reversal System GORE Embolic Filter use embolic protection carotid artery stenting .
DOC.brief_title: GORE Flow Reversal System GORE Embolic Filter Extension Study
DOC.detailed_description: Physicians opportunity select embolic protection device , GORE Flow Reversal System GORE Embolic Filter , use carotid artery stenting procedure . This study design compare study endpoint two treatment arm .
DOC.criteria: Patient , patient 's legal representative , able willing provide inform consent . Patient must least 18 year age old . Patient select treated accord GORE Flow Reversal System Instructions Use ( IFU ) GORE Embolic Filter IFU . Patient contraindicate embolic protection device arm select investigator receive : Either Per GORE Flow Reversal System IFU GORE Flow Reversal System select OR Per GORE Embolic Filter IFU GORE Embolic Filter select If patient contraindicate arm ( device ) may enrol .
